mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QA(QNA_NUM, ID, PRD_NUM, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONT) VALUES((#{qnaNum}+1), #{id}, #{prdNum}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaCont})
mapper.select: SELECT q.QNA_NUM, q.ID, q.PRD_NUM, q.QNA_TITLE, q.QNA_CONT, TO_CHAR(q.QNA_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as QNA_WRITE_DATE, q.QNA_A_FLAG, qa.QNA_A_NUM, qa.QNA_A_CONT, TO_CHAR(qa.QNA_A_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as QNA_A_WRITE_DATE, m.NAME FROM QA q, QA_ANSWER qa, MEMBER m WHERE (q.QNA_NUM=qa.QNA_NUM(+) AND m.ID=q.ID) AND q.QNA_NUM=#{ qnaNum }
